Title: Underneath
Plot: Scully, Doggett and Reyes investigate an old case that Doggett worked on as a cop in Brooklyn, dubbed "The Screwdriver Killer". They try to determine whether the man who was convicted and has just been released from prison was actually the man responsible for the murders.
GuestStars: Lisa Darr, Aaron D. Spears, Carol Kiernan, Michael Patterson, Kelly McNair, Mary-Margaret Lewis, Earl Brown, Alan Davidson, Robert Curtis Brown, Paul Vincent O'Connor, Arthur J. Nascarella, Rick Garcia, Pamela Ka
